notes.text:
Have all ingredients prepared before you start
Cook on high heat for best flavor
Adjust sweet-sour-salty balance to taste

steps.descr: Soak rice noodles in hot water until soft, drain

on_enter.say: Right, let's get those rice noodles soaking in hot water until they're nice and soft. Then we'll drain them and set them aside.

steps.instructions: Soak rice noodles in hot water until soft, drain

steps.descr: Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and palm sugar

on_enter.say: Let's mix up our lovely sauce with tamarind paste, fish sauce, and palm sugar. Give it a good stir until everything's combined beautifully.

steps.instructions: Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and palm sugar

steps.descr: Heat wok, scramble eggs, set aside

on_enter.say: Now, let's heat up that wok until it's nice and hot. Crack in the eggs and scramble them quickly, then set them aside for later.

steps.instructions: Heat wok, scramble eggs, set aside

steps.descr: Stir-fry prawns or chicken until cooked

on_enter.say: Let's get those prawns or chicken sizzling in the wok. Stir-fry them until they're cooked through and smelling fantastic.

steps.instructions: Stir-fry prawns or chicken until cooked

steps.descr: Add noodles and sauce, toss to combine

on_enter.say: Now, let's add those softened noodles and our lovely sauce to the wok. Give everything a good toss to combine all those amazing flavours.

steps.instructions: Add noodles and sauce, toss to combine

steps.descr: Add beansprouts and eggs, cook for 1 minute

on_enter.say: Let's toss in the beansprouts and those scrambled eggs. We'll cook it all together for just a minute to keep everything fresh and vibrant.

steps.instructions: Add beansprouts and eggs, cook for 1 minute

steps.descr: Serve with peanuts, lime, and fresh herbs

on_enter.say: Brilliant! It's time to serve up your delicious Pad Thai. Top it with crushed peanuts, a squeeze of lime, and some fresh herbs. Enjoy!

steps.instructions: Serve with peanuts, lime, and fresh herbs

recipe.title: Pad Thai
recipe.description: Sweet and tangy Thai rice noodles with peanuts and lime
